tests.gui.test_game_mode_section.test_game_mode_section_single_form_errors

tests.gui.test_game_mode_section.test_game_mode_section_single_form_errors(test_group)[source]

Test that the errors returned from :method: ~yawning_titan_gui.forms.GameModeSection.get_form_errors are correct and match those of the config class.
